explains: adj. （表示不认同）所谓的；叫做……的，号称……的

sentences.en: The so-called bargain was just a big con!
sentences.cn: 这种所谓的减价商品只不过是个大骗局！

sentences.en: How have these so-called improvements helped the local community?
sentences.cn: 这些所谓的进步对当地社会有什么帮助呢？

sentences.en: These are the facts that explode their so-called economic miracle.
sentences.cn: 这些就是戳穿他们所谓的经济奇迹的事实。
